personalInfo.name: Yash Gupta
personalInfo.title: Software Engineer 3
personalInfo.summary: Software Engineer with extensive experience in building scalable and high-performance web applications. Skilled in Node.js, React.js, and GraphQL, with a strong foundation in backend and frontend development. Passionate about leveraging AI and modern technologies to deliver innovative solutions.

experience.description: Migrated REST APIs to GraphQL, enhancing performance and security. Transitioned Angular-based platforms to React, achieving a 20% improvement in performance. Developed an SQL Server connector to streamline data integration. Supervised a team of three engineers to deliver high-quality solutions. Enhanced the CSV upload feature for better user experience and resolved critical customer-facing bugs. Designed scalable microservices using Node.js and optimized API structures for high performance.

Designed and developed responsive website layouts to improve user experience. Delivered projects ahead of schedule while maintaining high quality. Recognized as Best Team of the Month for exceptional collaboration and performance. Developed modern website designs and implemented client updates seamlessly.

education.institution: Dr. Ambedkar Institute of Technology, Kanpur
education.description: Graduated with a CGPA of 8.42, specializing in software engineering, algorithms, and database management.

education.institution: Mother Teresa Mission Higher Secondary School
education.description: Achieved 86.67% in Math and Science, building a strong foundation in problem-solving and analytical thinking.

projects.name: Flappy Bird Game
projects.description: A recreation of the classic Flappy Bird game using Python and Pygame. Features include player movement, obstacle creation, collision detection, and a scoring mechanism for engaging gameplay.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A responsive personal portfolio website showcasing skills, projects, and professional experience. Implemented modern design techniques and optimized for seamless navigation.

certifications.name: Namaste Node.js
certifications.description: Mastered asynchronous programming, event loop, and building scalable Node.js applications.

certifications.name: Namaste React
certifications.description: Acquired in-depth knowledge of React concepts, including hooks, lifecycle methods, and virtual DOM.

certifications.name: Namaste Frontend System Design
certifications.description: Learned to design scalable, efficient, and user-friendly frontend architectures.
